domain.page.title: Domain List
domain.nodata: Please add a domain to start deploying the certificate.
domain.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this domain?
domain.deploy.started.tips: Deployment initiated, please check the deployment log later.
domain.deploy.failed.tips: Execution failed, please check the details in <1>Deployment History</1>.
domain.application.form.email.label: Email
domain.application.form.email.tips: (A email is required to apply for a certificate)
domain.application.form.access.label: DNS Provider Authorization Configuration
domain.application.form.access.placehold: Please select DNS provider authorization configuration
domain.application.form.timeout.label: DNS Propagation Timeout (Seconds)
domain.application.form.timeoue.placehol: Please enter maximum waiting time for DNS propagation
domain.application.form.disable_follow_c: This option will disable Acme DNS authentication CNAME follow. If you don't understand this option, just keep it by default.
domain.deployment.form.type.label: Deploy Method
domain.deployment.form.access.label: Access Configuration
domain.deployment.form.cos_region.label: Region
domain.deployment.form.cos_bucket.label: Bucket
domain.deployment.form.clb_region.label: region(please distinguish between region and availability zone)
domain.deployment.form.clb_id.label: CLB id
domain.deployment.form.clb_id.placeholde: Please enter CLB id, e.g. lb-xxxxxxxx
domain.deployment.form.clb_listener.plac: Please enter listener id, e.g. lbl-xxxxxxxx. The specific listener should have set the corresponding domain HTTPS forwarding, and the original certificate domain should be consistent with the certificate to be deployed.
domain.deployment.form.clb_domain.label: Deploy to domain (Wildcard domain is also supported)
domain.deployment.form.clb_domain.placeh: Please enter domain to be deployed. If SNI is not enabled, you can leave it blank.
domain.deployment.form.domain.label: Deploy to domain (Single domain only, not wildcard domain)
domain.deployment.form.domain.label.wild: Deploy to domain (Wildcard domain is also supported)
domain.deployment.form.domain.placeholde: Please enter domain to be deployed
domain.deployment.form.ssh_key_path.plac: Please enter private key save path
domain.deployment.form.ssh_pre_command.p: Command to be executed before deploying the certificate
domain.deployment.form.ssh_command.label: Command
domain.deployment.form.iis_ip.label: IP address of IIS site
domain.deployment.form.iis_ip.placeholde: Please enter IP address, or use * for all IP addresses
domain.deployment.form.iis_port.label: Binding port of IIS site
domain.deployment.form.iis_domain.label: Domain
domain.deployment.form.iis_domain.placeh: Please enter domain, use \r\n for spliting multiple domains
domain.deployment.form.iis_note: Note: The certimate application should be run as administrator role when using IIS deployment
domain.deployment.form.oss_bucket.label: Bucket
domain.deployment.form.k8s_secret_data_k: Please enter secret data key for public key
Please enter secret data key for certificate
domain.deployment.form.variables.label: Variable
